text:
This line:
JAVA_OPTIONS=-Xms64m -Xmx128m

Should be:
JAVA_OPTIONS="-Xms64m -Xmx128m"

I get the error: 
"./xindice.sh: line 61: -Xmx128m: command not found"
from bash if it isn't.
creator: hattons@globalsymmetry.com

text: Thanks for the reporting the bug. Fixed in CVS.
creator: vgritsenko@apache.org
